titleStmt.title: Mr. Keith's sermon, preach'd on May the 12th, 1700. At Dr. Bedford's church, being Saint George Butolphs-Lane, by Billings-Gate. On Luke the 1st and verse 6th.
titleStmt.author: Keith, George, 1639?-1716.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and sold by most booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: "You are to take notice, this is the genuine copy"--t.p.
Imperfect: stained with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
